game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact of Eldora
game.description: Embark on an epic journey to retrieve the lost artifact of Eldora rumored to be hidden deep within the Forest of Shadows. You have been chosen by the village elder to end the century-long wait and bring back the artifact, restoring peace and prosperity in your village.

task.objective: Find the hidden map to Eldora artifact
task.description: The hidden map to Eldora artifact is said to be buried with the old king in the Royal Cemetery. Retrieve it.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the Forest
task.description: Upon entering the Forest of Shadows, you will be greeted by a monstrous guardian. Overcome this hurdle and proceed towards your goal.
Utilize the map to navigate through the darkness of the forest and find the location of the artifact. Beware of the unexpected challenges lying in your path.
task.location: Heart of the Forest of Shadows
